Class MockUtils

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.utils.MockUtils
public class MockUtils extends Object
Various mock creating utilities

    mockMavenSession()

    • mockAetherRepositorySystem

      public static org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystem mockAetherRepositorySystem(Map<String,String[]> versionMap)

      Parameters:

    • prepareAetherRepositorySystemMockForVersionRange

      public static void prepareAetherRepositorySystemMockForVersionRange(org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystem repositorySystem, Map<String,String[]> versionMap)
      Provides an mocked RepositorySystem instance for the given map of version updates.
      Parameters:
      repositorySystem - mocked RepositorySystem instance
      versionMap - a map consisting of artifact name as key of the map, and an array of versions which the repository system should return

    • mockMavenSession

      public static org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession mockMavenSession()
      Creates a very simple mock of MavenSession by providing only a non-null implementation of its MavenSession.getRepositorySession() method.
      Returns:
      mocked MavenSession

    • mockMavenSession

      public static org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession mockMavenSession(org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project)
      Creates a very simple mock of MavenSession by providing only a non-null implementation of its MavenSession.getRepositorySession() method.
      Parameters:
      project - MavenProject to link to
      Returns:
      mocked MavenSession
